column5: Hi All,  Was wondering where the best fishing could be had, on callander Bay or the West Arm for the may 24 weekend. Also any recommendations for a cottage would be appreciated.  Thanks, Bing

That is a crazy tough question. My preference is Callander Bay but my best producing area is closed until June 1st. Your best bet would be to get a cottage around Sturgeon Falls and fish Iron Island area and mouth of Sturgeon river.
West Arm can be great in the early season
OP could contact Kevin from Lakair Lodge (West Arm) through a PM.
